mapper.select: SELECT OFCNO,OFCNAME,MGRNAME,MEMNO,OFCTEL,OFCADDR FROM OFFICE ORDER BY OFCNO

select count(*) from notice
where NTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

SELECT RENTCAR.RCNO,RENTCAR.RCMODEL,RENTCAR.RCPRICE,RENTCAR.RCIMG,RENTCAR.RCSTATE,OFFICE.OFCNAME,NAVIGATION.NAVINAME,FUEL.FUELNAME,SEGMENT.SGMTNAME,MAKER.MNAME FROM RENTCAR, OFFICE, NAVIGATION, SEGMENT, FUEL, MAKER WHERE RENTCAR.OFCNO = OFFICE.OFCNO AND SEGMENT.SGMTNO = RENTCAR.SGMTNO AND RENTCAR.MAKERNO = MAKER.MAKERNO AND FUEL.FUELNO = RENTCAR.FUELNO AND RENTCAR.NAVINO = NAVIGATION.NAVINO
mapper.update: UPDATE RENTCAR SET RCSTATE='승인대기' WHERE RCNO=#{VALUE}
